Package org.hibernate.mapping

Interface Value

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Any, Array, Bag, Collection, Component, DependantValue, ExportableColumn.ValueImpl, IdentifierBag, IdentifierCollection, IndexedCollection, List, ManyToOne, Map, OneToMany, OneToOne, PrimitiveArray, Set, SimpleValue, ToOne
    public interface Value
extends java.io.Serializable
    A value is anything that is persisted by value, instead of by reference. It is essentially a Hibernate Type, together with zero or more columns. Values are wrapped by things with higher level semantics, for example properties, collections, classes.
